page.title: 11RECREATION
page.content: CHILDRENS' GAMES-ROUNDERS ROUNDERS IS PLAYED WITH TWO TEAMS,EACH TEAM BATTING OR FIELDING IN TURN.THE OBJECT OF THE GAME IS TO SCORE AS MANY ROUNDERS AS POSSIBLE BY HITTING THE BALL AND RUNNING ROUND THE PITCH WITHOUT BEING PUT OUT.THE PITCH IS IN THE SHAPE OF A SQUARE WITH A POST AT EACH CORNER.RUNNERS CAN BE CAUGHT OUT OR STUMPED BEFORE THEY REACH A POST.BOWLING IS DONE "UNDERHAND"AND THE BATSMAN IS ALLOWED ONE GOOD BALL. THREE CONSECUTIVE "NO BALLS" ARE PENALIZED BY HALF A ROUNDER TO THE BATTING TEAM.IF THE BATSMAN MISSES A GOOD BALL HE MUST RUN TO FIRST BASE.HE CAN RUN ON IF THERE IS MIS-FIELDING TO SCORE HALF A ROUNDER.
